ontology_schema.label: Legal Case
ontology_schema.description: The root node for all legal cases.

ontology_schema.label: Criminal Case
ontology_schema.description: Cases involving criminal offenses.

ontology_schema.label: Violent Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses involving physical harm or threat of harm.

ontology_schema.label: Sexual Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses related to sexual violence or exploitation.

ontology_schema.label: Rape (IPC 376)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of rape.

ontology_schema.label: Kidnapping (IPC 363)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of kidnapping from lawful guardianship.

ontology_schema.label: Sexual Harassment (IPC 354A)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of sexual harassment and punishment for sexual harassment.

ontology_schema.label: Assault/Hurt
ontology_schema.description: Offenses involving hurt or assault.

ontology_schema.label: Voluntarily causing hurt (IPC 323)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of voluntarily causing simple hurt.

ontology_schema.label: Voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons (IPC 324)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons or means.

ontology_schema.label: Attempt to Murder (IPC 307)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of attempt to murder.

ontology_schema.label: Culpable Homicide not amounting to Murder (IPC 304 Part II)
ontology_schema.description: Culpable homicide not amounting to murder, where the act is done with the knowledge that it is likely to cause death, but without the intention to cause death.

ontology_schema.label: Causing death of quick unborn child (IPC 316)
ontology_schema.description: Causing death of a quick unborn child by an act amounting to culpable homicide.

ontology_schema.label: Abetment of Suicide (IPC 306)
ontology_schema.description: If any person commits suicide, whoever abets the commission of such suicide, shall be punished.

ontology_schema.label: Property Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses against property.

ontology_schema.label: Theft
ontology_schema.description: Offenses involving the taking of property dishonestly.

ontology_schema.label: Theft in dwelling house (IPC 380)
ontology_schema.description: Theft committed in any building, tent or vessel used as a human dwelling.

ontology_schema.label: Mischief causing damage (IPC 427)
ontology_schema.description: Mischief causing damage to the amount of fifty rupees or upwards.

ontology_schema.label: Robbery and Extortion
ontology_schema.description: Offenses where theft or extortion is compounded by violence or threat.

ontology_schema.label: Robbery (IPC 392)
ontology_schema.description: Punishment for robbery.

ontology_schema.label: Voluntarily causing hurt in committing robbery (IPC 394)
ontology_schema.description: Voluntarily causing hurt in committing or attempting to commit robbery.

ontology_schema.label: Robbery or dacoity, with attempt to cause death or grievous hurt (IPC 397)
ontology_schema.description: Robbery or dacoity, with attempt to cause death or grievous hurt.

ontology_schema.label: Extortion (IPC 384)
ontology_schema.description: Offense of extortion.

ontology_schema.label: Dacoity
ontology_schema.description: Offenses committed by five or more persons working together to commit or attempt to commit robbery.

ontology_schema.label: Punishment for dacoity (IPC 395)
ontology_schema.description: Punishment for the offense of dacoity.

ontology_schema.label: Trespass
ontology_schema.description: Offenses related to unauthorized entry onto property.

ontology_schema.label: House-trespass after preparation for hurt, assault or wrongful restraint (IPC 452)
ontology_schema.description: House-trespass having made preparation for causing hurt to any person, or for assaulting any person, or for wrongfully restraining any person, or for putting any person in fear of hurt, or of assault, or of wrongful restraint.

ontology_schema.label: Lurking house-trespass or house-breaking by night in order to commit offence punishable with imprisonment (IPC 457)
ontology_schema.description: Lurking house-trespass or house-breaking by night in order to commit offence punishable with imprisonment.

ontology_schema.label: Preparatory Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses related to preparation for a future crime, often dacoity.

ontology_schema.label: Making preparation to commit dacoity (IPC 399)
ontology_schema.description: Making any preparation for the purpose of committing dacoity.

ontology_schema.label: Assembling for purpose of committing dacoity (IPC 402)
ontology_schema.description: Assembling with five or more persons for the purpose of committing dacoity.

ontology_schema.label: Other Offense
ontology_schema.description: A catch-all category for offenses not classified under the main criminal branches.

ontology_schema.label: Terrorism Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses related to acts of terrorism or unlawful activities against the State (e.g., POTA, UAPA).

ontology_schema.label: Matrimonial Offense
ontology_schema.description: Offenses primarily arising out of marital relationships.

ontology_schema.label: Cruelty by Husband or Relatives (IPC 498A)
ontology_schema.description: Subjecting a married woman to cruelty by her husband or relatives of her husband.

ontology_schema.label: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act (PWDVA)
ontology_schema.description: Seeking protection, residence, monetary, or custody orders under the PWDVA.

ontology_schema.label: Monetary Relief under PWDVA (S. 20)
ontology_schema.description: Claim for expenses incurred and losses suffered as a result of the domestic violence.

ontology_schema.label: Family Law Dispute
ontology_schema.description: Cases involving personal laws like divorce, maintenance, and child custody.

ontology_schema.label: Maintenance Proceedings
ontology_schema.description: Claims for financial support under various laws (e.g., CrPC 125, HMA 24).

ontology_schema.label: Maintenance under CrPC 125
ontology_schema.description: Order for maintenance of wives, children and parents.

ontology_schema.label: Maintenance Pendente Lite (HMA 24)
ontology_schema.description: Maintenance pendente lite and expenses of proceedings under the Hindu Marriage Act.

parties_name.description: The names of the main parties (e.g., 'A.K. Goel vs. State of Delhi').

court_name.description: The name of the court that delivered the judgment (e.g., 'High Court of Delhi').

case_number_year.description: The case number and year (e.g., 'Crl. Appeal No.1192/2011').

judgment_date.description: The date the judgment was delivered (e.g., '15th March, 2012').

appellant_or_petitioner.description: The name(s) of the appellant or petitioner.

judges_coram.description: The name(s) of the judge(s) who delivered the judgment.

court_type.description: Whether it's a Supreme Court, High Court, or Trial Court judgment.

appeal_or_original_jurisdiction.description: The nature of the jurisdiction (e.g., 'Criminal Appeal', 'Writ Petition').

ipc_sections_charged.description: The specific Indian Penal Code sections and/or other Acts applied (e.g., 'IPC 302, 316').

nature_of_offense_category.description: The broad category of the offense (e.g., 'Violent Offense', 'Property Offense').

accused_age.description: The age of the accused at the time of the offense.

victim_age.description: The age of the victim at the time of the offense.

time_of_offense.description: The approximate time of the crime (e.g., '10:00 PM', 'Midnight').

place_of_offense.description: The location where the crime took place (e.g., 'dwelling house', 'public road').

motive_for_crime.description: The driving factor for the crime (e.g., 'revenge', 'greed', 'matrimonial dispute').

police_station.description: The police station where the FIR was registered.

stage_of_trial_or_appeal.description: The current judicial stage (e.g., 'Trial Court conviction', 'High Court Appeal').

nature_of_injury.description: Medical description of the harm caused (e.g., 'simple hurt', 'grievous hurt', 'burn injuries').

weapon_used.description: The object or means used to cause harm (e.g., 'knife', 'lathi', 'kerosene').

number_of_accused.description: The total count of individuals charged with the offense.

consent_status.description: Whether the act was with or without consent.

age_of_victim.description: The age of the victim at the time of the offense.

relationship_with_accused.description: The relationship between the victim and the accused (e.g., 'stranger', 'family member', 'acquaintance').

resistance_offered.description: Whether the victim actively resisted the act.

taking_or_enticing_a_minor.description: Whether the minor was taken or induced to leave.

out_of_lawful_guardianship.description: Whether the act was without the consent of the guardian.

motive_for_kidnapping.description: The reason behind the kidnapping (e.g., 'forced marriage', 'ransom').

relationship_with_minor.description: Relationship between the accused and the minor (e.g., 'acquaintance', 'stranger').

sexual_harassment_act.description: The specific nature of the harassment defined under the section.

against_a_woman.description: Whether the victim is a woman.

physical_contact_and_advances.description: Whether the offense involves unwelcome physical contact and advances.

demand_or_request_for_sexual_favours.description: Whether the offense involves a demand or request for sexual favours.

showing_pornography_against_will.description: Whether the offense involves showing pornography against the will of a woman.

making_sexually_coloured_remarks.description: Whether the offense involves making sexually coloured remarks.

act_causing_hurt.description: The specific act done to cause hurt.

nature_of_hurt.description: Medical description of the injury (must not be grievous).

templates.label: Voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons (IPC 324)

dangerous_weapon_or_means.description: The nature of the weapon or means used (e.g., 'fire', 'cutting instrument', 'poison').

intent_or_knowledge_to_cause_death.description: Whether the accused acted with the intention or knowledge requisite for murder.

act_towards_commission_of_murder.description: The specific act done towards causing death.

injury_sustained.description: Description of the injury, if any, caused to the victim.

templates.label: Culpable Homicide not amounting to Murder (IPC 304 Part II)

knowledge_of_consequence.description: Whether the accused had knowledge that his act was likely to cause death, but without the intention to cause death.

death_caused_without_intention.description: Whether the act caused death, but fell outside the scope of murder (e.g., due to an exception to S. 300).

templates.label: Causing death of quick unborn child (IPC 316)

act_amounting_to_culpable_homicide.description: Whether the act committed by the accused was of such a nature as to constitute culpable homicide (e.g., S. 304).

suicide_method.description: The method used by the deceased to commit suicide (e.g., 'hanging', 'self-immolation').

relationship_with_deceased.description: The nature of the relationship between the accused and the deceased (e.g., 'spouse', 'business partner', 'relative').

abetment_act.description: The specific act of instigation, conspiracy, or intentional aid that led to the suicide.

property_nature.description: The nature of the property involved (e.g., 'movable' or 'immovable').

loss_or_damage_caused.description: Description of the loss or damage sustained.

property_owner.description: The identity of the person in legal possession of the property.

dishonest_intention.description: Whether the taking was with dishonest intention.

out_of_possession_of_person.description: Whether the property was taken out of any person's possession.

property_description.description: Detailed description of the stolen property.

force_used_or_not.description: Whether any force or threat was involved (distinguishes from robbery/extortion).

location_type.description: The property must be a building, tent, or vessel used for dwelling or custody of property.

intention_or_knowledge_to_cause_damage.description: Whether the accused intended or knew that damage would result.

damage_amount_over_fifty_rupees.description: The amount of damage caused (must be fifty rupees or upwards).

theft_or_extortion.description: Whether the offense was committed as a 'theft' or 'extortion'.

use_of_immediate_force_or_fear_of_death_.description: Whether the immediate fear of death, hurt, or wrongful restraint was caused/attempted.

time_of_robbery.description: Whether the robbery was committed 'on the highway' and 'between sunset and sunrise'.

templates.label: Voluntarily causing hurt in committing robbery (IPC 394)

voluntary_causing_hurt.description: Whether the accused voluntarily caused hurt.

person_concerned_in_robbery.description: Whether the person causing hurt was the robber or any other person jointly concerned in the robbery.

templates.label: Robbery or dacoity, with attempt to cause death or grievous hurt (IPC 397)

offender_uses_deadly_weapon.description: Whether the offender used or attempted to use any deadly weapon.

grievous_hurt_or_death_attempted.description: Whether the offender voluntarily causes or attempts to cause death or grievous hurt.

at_time_of_committing_robbery_or_dacoity.description: Whether the act occurred at the time of committing or attempting to commit robbery/dacoity.

weapon_description.description: Description of the deadly weapon (e.g., 'loaded gun', 'sharp knife').

fear_of_injury_induced.description: Whether the person was put in fear of any injury.

delivery_of_property_forced.description: Whether the delivery of any property or valuable security was dishonestly induced.

five_or_more_persons_committing_dacoity.description: The requirement that five or more persons must be committing or attempting to commit dacoity.

entry_or_stay_without_permission.description: Whether the entry was unlawful or the stay became unlawful.

intention_to_commit_offense_or_intimidat.description: The intent element: to commit an offense, or to intimidate, insult, or annoy the person in possession.

property_location_or_type.description: The nature of the property trespassed upon.

templates.label: House-trespass after preparation for hurt, assault or wrongful restraint (IPC 452)

house_trespass_committed.description: Whether the criminal trespass amounts to house-trespass.

preparation_for_hurt_assault_or_restrain.description: Whether preparation was made for causing hurt, assault, or wrongful restraint.

templates.label: Lurking house-trespass or house-breaking by night in order to commit offence punishable with imprisonment (IPC 457)

night_time.description: Whether the act was committed between sunset and sunrise.

intention_to_commit_punishable_offence.description: The intent to commit any offense punishable with imprisonment.

specific_offence_intended.description: The specific offense intended to be committed.

material_collected.description: Specific materials or instruments prepared for the crime.

preparation_for_dacoity_made.description: Whether any preparation was made for the purpose of committing dacoity.

templates.label: Assembling for purpose of committing dacoity (IPC 402)

assembling_five_or_more_persons.description: Whether five or more persons assembled for the purpose of committing dacoity.

terrorist_act_definition.description: The specific definition of the terrorist act satisfied.

unlawful_possession_of_arms.description: Details of the arms or ammunition possessed ('unauthorized arms').

intent_or_knowledge.description: The knowledge or intent to further a terrorist organization's activities.

material_or_device_used.description: The explosive substance or device used/possessed.

duration_of_marriage.description: Length of time the marriage has subsisted.

subjected_to_cruelty.description: Whether the woman was subjected to cruelty.

cruelty_by_husband_or_relative.description: Whether the accused is the husband or a relative of the husband.

nature_of_cruelty.description: Description of the mental or physical harassment.

injury_caused_to_life_or_health.description: Whether the cruelty was likely to drive the woman to suicide or cause grave injury/danger to life/health.

death_caused_by_suicide.description: If the cruelty led to the woman committing suicide.

complaint_filed_by_woman_or_relative.description: Whether the complaint was filed by the aggrieved woman or a family member on her behalf.

templates.label: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act (PWDVA)

domestic_relationship.description: Whether the applicant and respondent are in a domestic relationship.

domestic_violence_occurrence.description: Whether an act of domestic violence has occurred.

relief_sought.description: The specific relief asked for (e.g., 'Protection Order', 'Residence Order', 'Monetary Relief').

date_of_application_for_PWDVA.description: Date when the PWDVA application was filed.

quantum_of_monetary_relief.description: The amount of monetary relief granted.

ground_for_monetary_relief.description: The basis of the relief (e.g., 'loss of earnings', 'medical expenses').

date_of_order_for_monetary_relief.description: The date the monetary relief order was passed.

act_under_which_relief_sought.description: The governing law (e.g., 'Hindu Marriage Act', 'Guardians and Wards Act').

children_involved.description: Whether minor children are involved in the dispute.

financial_assets_in_dispute.description: Details about shared or disputed financial assets.

applicant_financial_status.description: Details about the applicant's occupation, income, and assets.

respondent_financial_status.description: Details about the respondent's occupation, income, and assets.

date_of_application_for_maintenance.description: Date when the maintenance application was filed.

grounds_for_seeking_maintenance.description: The legal or factual basis for the maintenance claim (e.g., 'no source of income', 'illness').

previous_maintenance_orders.description: Details of any prior maintenance orders (e.g., under DV Act).

quantum_of_maintenance_ordered.description: The amount of maintenance granted or denied.

neglect_or_refusal_to_maintain.description: Whether the respondent neglected or refused to maintain the applicant.

person_unable_to_maintain_themselves.description: The category of the applicant (e.g., 'wife', 'minor child', 'parent').

applicant_has_no_independent_income.description: Whether the applicant has no independent income sufficient for their support.

amount_of_income_for_support.description: The amount fixed for support (pendente lite).

costs_of_proceedings_granted.description: The amount granted for the expenses of the proceedings.

parties_name.description: The names of the main parties (e.g., 'A.K. Goel vs. State of Delhi').

court_name.description: The name of the court that delivered the judgment (e.g., 'High Court of Delhi').

case_number_year.description: The case number and year (e.g., 'Crl. Appeal No.1192/2011').

judgment_date.description: The date the judgment was delivered (e.g., '15th March, 2012').

appellant_or_petitioner.description: The name(s) of the appellant or petitioner.

judges_coram.description: The name(s) of the judge(s) who delivered the judgment.

court_type.description: Whether it's a Supreme Court, High Court, or Trial Court judgment.

appeal_or_original_jurisdiction.description: The nature of the jurisdiction (e.g., 'Criminal Appeal', 'Writ Petition').

ipc_sections_charged.description: The specific Indian Penal Code sections and/or other Acts applied (e.g., 'IPC 302, 316').

weapon_used.description: The object or means used to cause harm (e.g., 'knife', 'lathi', 'kerosene').

number_of_accused.description: The total count of individuals charged with the offense.

consent_status.description: Whether the act was with or without consent.

age_of_victim.description: The age of the victim at the time of the offense.

relationship_with_accused.description: The relationship between the victim and the accused (e.g., 'stranger', 'family member', 'acquaintance').

resistance_offered.description: Whether the victim actively resisted the act.

motive_for_kidnapping.description: The reason behind the kidnapping (e.g., 'forced marriage', 'ransom').

relationship_with_minor.description: Relationship between the accused and the minor (e.g., 'acquaintance', 'stranger').

against_a_woman.description: Whether the victim is a woman.

physical_contact_and_advances.description: Whether the offense involves unwelcome physical contact and advances.

demand_or_request_for_sexual_favours.description: Whether the offense involves a demand or request for sexual favours.

showing_pornography_against_will.description: Whether the offense involves showing pornography against the will of a woman.

making_sexually_coloured_remarks.description: Whether the offense involves making sexually coloured remarks.

nature_of_hurt.description: Medical description of the injury (must not be grievous).

material_collected.description: Specific materials or instruments prepared for the crime.

preparation_for_dacoity_made.description: Whether any preparation was made for the purpose of committing dacoity.

assembling_five_or_more_persons.description: Whether five or more persons assembled for the purpose of committing dacoity.

entry_or_stay_without_permission.description: Whether the entry was unlawful or the stay became unlawful.

preparation_for_hurt_assault_or_restrain.description: Whether preparation was made for causing hurt, assault, or wrongful restraint.

night_time.description: Whether the act was committed between sunset and sunrise.

intention_to_commit_punishable_offence.description: The intent to commit any offense punishable with imprisonment.

terrorist_act_definition.description: The specific definition of the terrorist act satisfied.

unlawful_possession_of_arms.description: Details of the arms or ammunition possessed ('unauthorized arms').

intent_or_knowledge.description: The knowledge or intent to further a terrorist organization's activities.

material_or_device_used.description: The explosive substance or device used/possessed.

duration_of_marriage.description: Length of time the marriage has subsisted.

subjected_to_cruelty.description: Whether the woman was subjected to cruelty.

cruelty_by_husband_or_relative.description: Whether the accused is the husband or a relative of the husband.

nature_of_cruelty.description: Description of the mental or physical harassment.

injury_caused_to_life_or_health.description: Whether the cruelty was likely to drive the woman to suicide or cause grave injury/danger to life/health.

death_caused_by_suicide.description: If the cruelty led to the woman committing suicide.

complaint_filed_by_woman_or_relative.description: Whether the complaint was filed by the aggrieved woman or a family member on her behalf.

domestic_relationship.description: Whether the applicant and respondent are in a domestic relationship.

domestic_violence_occurrence.description: Whether an act of domestic violence has occurred.

relief_sought.description: The specific relief asked for (e.g., 'Protection Order', 'Residence Order', 'Monetary Relief').

date_of_application_for_PWDVA.description: Date when the PWDVA application was filed.

quantum_of_monetary_relief.description: The amount of monetary relief granted.

ground_for_monetary_relief.description: The basis of the relief (e.g., 'loss of earnings', 'medical expenses').

date_of_order_for_monetary_relief.description: The date the monetary relief order was passed.

act_under_which_relief_sought.description: The governing law (e.g., 'Hindu Marriage Act', 'Guardians and Wards Act').

children_involved.description: Whether minor children are involved in the dispute.

financial_assets_in_dispute.description: Details about shared or disputed financial assets.

applicant_financial_status.description: Details about the applicant's occupation, income, and assets.

respondent_financial_status.description: Details about the respondent's occupation, income, and assets.

date_of_application_for_maintenance.description: Date when the maintenance application was filed.

grounds_for_seeking_maintenance.description: The legal or factual basis for the maintenance claim (e.g., 'no source of income', 'illness').

previous_maintenance_orders.description: Details of any prior maintenance orders (e.g., under DV Act).

quantum_of_maintenance_ordered.description: The amount of maintenance granted or denied.

neglect_or_refusal_to_maintain.description: Whether the respondent neglected or refused to maintain the applicant.

person_unable_to_maintain_themselves.description: The category of the applicant (e.g., 'wife', 'minor child', 'parent').

applicant_has_no_independent_income.description: Whether the applicant has no independent income sufficient for their support.

amount_of_income_for_support.description: The amount fixed for support (pendente lite).

costs_of_proceedings_granted.description: The amount granted for the expenses of the proceedings.

dowry_demand_motive.description: Whether the harassment/cruelty was linked to an illegal demand for property or valuable security (dowry).

cause_of_suicide.description: The nature of the instigation or circumstances that drove the deceased to commit suicide (e.g., 'continuous harassment', 'financial dispute', 'matrimonial cruelty').

victim_pregnancy_status.description: The stage of the victim's pregnancy at the time of the offense (e.g., 'nine months pregnant').

child_outcome_ipc_316.description: The outcome for the unborn child (e.g., 'stillborn child', 'died after birth').

accused_intoxication.description: Whether the accused was in an inebriated state at the time of the incident.

sudden_fight_in_passion.description: Whether the act was committed in the heat of passion upon a sudden quarrel (Exception 4 to S. 300).

knowledge_of_consequence.description: Whether the accused had knowledge that his act was likely to cause death, but without the intention to cause death.

death_caused_without_intention.description: Whether the act caused death, but fell outside the scope of murder (e.g., due to an exception to S. 300).

act_amounting_to_culpable_homicide.description: Whether the act committed by the accused was of such a nature as to constitute culpable homicide (e.g., S. 304).

suicide_method.description: The method used by the deceased to commit suicide (e.g., 'hanging', 'self-immolation').

relationship_with_deceased.description: The nature of the relationship between the accused and the deceased (e.g., 'spouse', 'business partner', 'relative').

abetment_act.description: The specific act of instigation, conspiracy, or intentional aid that led to the suicide.
